meanings.sent1: The dandelion had pappous seeds ready to fly in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The fluffy pappous flowers added beauty to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The pappous clouds in the sky looked like soft pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like a pappous halo around her head.
meanings.sent5: The pappous feathers of the bird shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The botanist studied the structure of the pappous on the seed.
meanings.sent2: The wind carried the pappous of the thistle far away.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the pappous as tiny parachutes.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a blanket of pappous after the flowers bloomed.
meanings.sent5: The child blew on the dandelion, scattering its pappous into the air.
